file_content.text: Who is here? There is no business between us. Farewell.
Waiting, waiting. Hate waiting, hate wai--you! You are sent by Folaris, yes? Yes, you are how she describes you.
She calls me, tells me you have a nice list of names I maybe want, I maybe can sell. Let me see this list, yes? Then we talk credits.
Of course.
This list wasn't easy to get.
Of course! Did not Folaris tell you? Nizkif is always paying good for good info.
You aren't seeing this list until I see some credits.
Money up front.
You are expecting me to pay for a thing I do not see? Would you do this?
You no worry about your money. I am good for it, Folaris tell you so. Now please--datapad.
Here it is--Black Sun's hit list, right here on a datapad.
Fair enough.
This had better not be a double-cross.
I don't like it, but fine.
No, no--no tricks, no crossing double. Nizkif is trusty, you can be sure of this.
Guess I'll have to sell this list to someone who can pay.
Forget it, deal's off.
Fine, then. Folaris say the list is good, so I am thinking maybe that is good enough. Here are credits, take them.
Let me see... yes, yes, this is good list. Interesting, valuable!
So many names, so many potential buyers! You do good work, bringing this list to Nizkif. I will be finding much use for it.
I'm sure you'll find a lot of interested buyers.
Yes, I'd imagine so.
I'd like to think you'll caution the people on that list of the danger they're in.
Will you warn everyone?
I will tell them there is danger. Then they will pay me to find out what danger is. This is how I make my credits.
Black Sun must have many enemies.
So it's a long list?
Yes, they make many people angry. Not Nizkif, though! I make many credits because of Black Sun making enemies.
Happy to be of service.
Another satisfied customer.
That's highly sensitive intel--don't get in over your head.
Be careful who you talk to.
Oh, yes, Nizkif is known for his carefulness. I am doing this for long time now.
I didn't come here to chat.
Yes, yes, you are busy, lots to be doing.
Enjoy your share of credits, my friend. You do good work.
Here is your share of the credits. I give Folaris her share later, so don't be worrying about that.
It is pleasure doing business with you. Perhaps we meet again later. Farewell.
Greetings to you.
